member.name: M:OrchardCore.Search.AzureAI.AzureAISearchIndexNamingHelper.TryGetSafeIndexName(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Makes sure that the index names are compliant with Azure AI Search specifications. .

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Search.AzureAI.IAzureAISearchIndexEvents.RemovingAsync(OrchardCore.Search.AzureAI.Models.AzureAISearchIndexRemoveContext)
member.summary: This event is invoked before removing an existing that already exists.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Search.AzureAI.IAzureAISearchIndexEvents.RemovedAsync(OrchardCore.Search.AzureAI.Models.AzureAISearchIndexRemoveContext)
member.summary: This event is invoked after the index is removed.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Search.AzureAI.IAzureAISearchIndexEvents.RebuildingAsync(OrchardCore.Search.AzureAI.Models.AzureAISearchIndexRebuildContext)
member.summary: This event is invoked before the index is rebuilt. If the rebuild deletes the index and create a new one, other events like Removing, Removed, Creating, or Created should not be invoked.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Search.AzureAI.IAzureAISearchIndexEvents.RebuiltAsync(OrchardCore.Search.AzureAI.Models.AzureAISearchIndexRebuildContext)
member.summary: This event is invoked after the index is rebuilt.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Search.AzureAI.IAzureAISearchIndexEvents.CreatingAsync(OrchardCore.Search.AzureAI.Models.AzureAISearchIndexCreateContext)
member.summary: This event is invoked before the index is created.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Search.AzureAI.IAzureAISearchIndexEvents.CreatedAsync(OrchardCore.Search.AzureAI.Models.AzureAISearchIndexCreateContext)
member.summary: This event is invoked after the index is created.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Search.AzureAI.Services.AzureAISearchIndexSettingsService.LoadDocumentAsync
member.summary: Loads the index settings document from the store for updating and that should not be cached.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Search.AzureAI.Services.AzureAISearchIndexSettingsService.GetDocumentAsync
member.summary: Gets the index settings document from the cache for sharing and that should not be updated.
